name: WP Awesome Quotes
author: Ankit Chugh

sections.description:
The plugin displays a random quote at the time of page loading. This plugin is useful when the website speed is very slow and a blank page displayed until the website is loaded. The plugin replaces the blank screen with awesome quotes at the time of the page loading.

You can also set the colors and UI settings of the quotes from the admin via plugins settings page.

NOTE: Please do clear or purge website cache after plugin activation.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin follow below steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Change the settings as per your requirements (optional)
  4. Clear or purge website cache.
  5. Here we go, no other settings needed.
sections.faq:
When this plugin is useful?

This plugin is useful when the website speed is very slow and a blank page displayed until the website is loaded. The plugin replaces the blank screen with awesome quotes at the time of the page loading. Administrator can add their own quotes from wordpress admin as well.

You can also set the colors and UI settings of the quotes from the admin via plugins settings page.

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Options given to admin to change background, font color and font size of the quots.

1.0.3

  • Options given to admin to add/delete quotes from admin.

1.0.2

  • Settings given in admin to enable/disable quotes
